item.title: Computer Vision : Object Detection - Non Maximum Suppression
item.description: #Target Implement Non Maximum Suppression used in object detection. #Introduction This section introduces Intersection over Union and Non Maximum Suppression used in Computer Vision: Object Detection Part2-Single Shot Multi Detector. ##Non Maximum Suppression (NMS) In object detection, multiple candidate regions that are presumed to exist may be obtained for one recognized object, as shown in the figure below. The part surrounded by the colored rectangle indicates the candidate area, and the display at the upper left of each candidate area indicates the category and the certainty factor of the object existing in that candidate area.
